about.text: An enigmatic figure with a penchant for polite refusals, Bartleby is a seasoned scrivener who has found himself reluctantly navigating the modern job market. While he would 'prefer not to,' economic necessities compel him to offer his meticulous copyist skills to prospective employers.

items.text: Greetings. I am [Bartleby](https://prefer-not-to.com/bartleby), a scrivener by trade. My experience in meticulously copying legal documents is unparalleled, though I must admit, I would prefer not to elaborate further. Nevertheless, here I am, offering my services out of sheer necessity.
items.title: An Unenthusiastic Hello

items.text: Throughout my career, I have worked in quiet corners of various law offices, diligently copying documents by hand. My notable engagements include a tenure at [Dead Letters Office](https://deadlettersoffice.gov), where I handled undeliverable mail with a level of detachment that was considered exemplary. I have a consistent record of showing up to the office, which, in these times, is something.
items.title: A Reluctant Journey

items.text: While I possess the skills necessary for modern office environments, such as typing and basic computer use, I would prefer not to engage with overly complicated technology. My expertise lies in quiet persistence and the ability to stare blankly at walls for extended periods—a skill undervalued in today's hustle culture.
items.title: Skills Best Left Unmentioned

items.text: I am seeking a position where demands are minimal and the existential dread is plentiful. While I would prefer not to take on new responsibilities, I understand that the economy leaves me little choice. If you require someone who will dutifully (if reluctantly) fulfill tasks assigned, I'm available—though not particularly willing.
items.title: Why You Might Consider Me

items.text:
Should you desire to discuss this further (though I can't imagine why), you may contact me at [bartleby@prefer-not-to.com](mailto:bartleby@prefer-not-to.com). I would prefer not to respond, but circumstances may dictate otherwise.

Indifferently yours,
Bartleby
items.title: Reluctant Contact

identity.name: Bartleby, the Scrivener
identity.tagline: A scrivener who would prefer not to, but must.

items.title: Dead Letters Office
items.description: Handled undeliverable mail with unwavering indifference. The position required a high tolerance for tedium, which I provided in abundance.

items.title: Wall Street Law Copyist
items.description: Meticulously copied legal documents by hand. Preferred not to engage in office banter or extracurricular activities.

items.title: Contemplations on Walls
items.description: A series of essays reflecting on the nuances of staring at walls and the profundities one might (or might not) discover.
Performed copying duties with exceptional accuracy. Preferred not to participate in additional tasks such as proofreading or running errands.
Managed undeliverable mail. Exhibited a remarkable ability to remain unmoved by the contents of lost correspondence.
Provided document copying services to private clients. Preferred not to advertise these services widely.
Assisted professors with note-taking and copying lecture materials. Preferred not to engage in academic discussions.
